nodes.bodyText:
What does the 1 mean here?
And why is there a rotation field at all, can't the rotation be included in the matrix?

nodes.bodyText:
The Forge class calls them leftRot and rightRot. Tbh a lot of these names in this class are a mess and warrant a PR of their own.

And why is there a rotation field at all, can't the rotation be included in the matrix?

It is. It's a cached version that may be recomputed in the getter.
nodes.diffHunk:

 	FIELD field_20905 rotation1 Lnet/minecraft/class_1158;

nodes.bodyText: These fields are really only initialized but never used... The only getRotation2 is retained because when IDENTITY is constructed, getRotation2 is called to initialize the components
